content.name: Endpoint
content.description: Class with the static factory methods to create instances of Connection and APIs

methods.name: setup
methods.description: Load the Endpoint's WASM assets and initialize the Endpoint library.

params.name: assetsBasePath
params.description: base path/url to the Endpoint's WebAssembly assets (like: endpoint-wasm-module.js, driver-web-context.js and others)

methods.name: getEventQueue
methods.description: Gets the EventQueue instance.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects to the platform backend.

methods.name: connectPublic
methods.description: Connects to the Platform backend as a guest user.

methods.name: createThreadApi
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Thread API.

methods.name: createStoreApi
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Store API.

methods.name: createInboxApi
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Inbox API.

methods.name: createCryptoApi
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Crypto API.

methods.name: createEventApi
methods.description: Creates an instance of 'EventApi'.

methods.name: getConnectionId
methods.description: Gets the ID of the current connection.

methods.name: listContexts
methods.description: Gets a list of Contexts available for the user.

returns.description: struct containing a list of Contexts

methods.name: getContextUsers
methods.description: Gets a list of users of given context.

returns.description: a list of the UserInfo objects

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Disconnects from the Platform backend.

methods.name: setUserVerifier
methods.description: Sets user's custom verification callback. The feature allows the developer to set up a callback for user verification. A developer can implement an interface and pass the implementation to the function. Each time data is read from the container, a callback will be triggered, allowing the developer to validate the sender in an external service, e.g. Developer's Application Server or PKI Server.

content.name: EventQueue
content.description: Class representing instance of Event Queue

content.name: ThreadApi
content.description: Class representing instance of Threads API

methods.name: createThread
methods.description: Creates a new Thread in given Context.
methods.snippet: createThread(contextId, users, managers, publicMeta, privateMeta, policies)

params.name: contextId
params.description: ID of the Context to create the Thread in

params.name: users
params.description: array of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access to the created Thread

params.name: managers
params.description: array of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access (and management rights) to the created Thread

methods.name: updateThread
methods.description: Updates an existing Thread.
methods.snippet: updateThread(threadId, users, managers, publicMeta, privateMeta, version, force, forceGenerateNewKey, policies)

params.name: threadId
params.description: ID of the Thread to update

params.name: users
params.description: array of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access to the created Thread

params.name: managers
params.description: array of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access (and management rights) to the created Thread

params.name: version
params.description: current version of the updated Thread

params.name: forceGenerateNewKey
params.description: force to regenerate a key for the Thread

methods.name: deleteThread
methods.description: Deletes a Thread by given Thread ID.

params.name: threadId
params.description: ID of the Thread to delete

methods.name: getThread
methods.description: Gets a Thread by given Thread ID.

returns.description: struct containing info about the Thread

methods.name: listThreads
methods.description: Gets a list of Threads in given Context.

params.name: contextId
params.description: ID of the Context to get the Threads from

returns.description: struct containing a list of Threads

methods.name: getMessage
methods.description: Gets a message by given message ID.

params.name: messageId
params.description: ID of the message to get

methods.name: listMessages
methods.description: Gets a list of messages from a Thread.

params.name: threadId
params.description: ID of the Thread to list messages from

returns.description: struct containing a list of messages

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message in a Thread.

params.name: threadId
params.description: ID of the Thread to send message to

methods.name: deleteMessage
methods.description: Deletes a message by given message ID.

params.name: messageId
params.description: ID of the message to delete

methods.name: updateMessage
methods.description: Update message in a Thread.

params.name: messageId
params.description: ID of the message to update

methods.name: subscribeForThreadEvents
methods.description: Subscribes for the Thread module main events.

methods.name: unsubscribeFromThreadEvents
methods.description: Unsubscribes from the Thread module main events.

methods.name: subscribeForMessageEvents
methods.description: Subscribes for events in given Thread.

params.name: threadId
params.description: ID of the Thread to subscribe

methods.name: unsubscribeFromMessageEvents
methods.description: Unsubscribes from events in given Thread.

params.name: threadId
params.description: ID of the Thread to unsubscribe

content.name: StoreApi
content.description: Class representing instance of Stores API

methods.name: createStore
methods.description: Creates a new Store in given Context.
methods.snippet: createStore(contextId, users, managers, publicMeta, privateMeta, policies)

params.name: contextId
params.description: ID of the Context to create the Store in

params.name: users
params.description: array of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access to the created Store

params.name: managers
params.description: array of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access (and management rights) to the created Store

methods.name: updateStore
methods.description: Updates an existing Store.
methods.snippet: updateStore(storeId, users, managers, publicMeta, privateMeta, version, force, forceGenerateNewKey, policies)

params.name: storeId
params.description: ID of the Store to update

params.name: users
params.description: array of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access to the created Store

params.name: managers
params.description: array of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access (and management rights) to the created Store

params.name: version
params.description: current version of the updated Store

params.name: forceGenerateNewKey
params.description: force to regenerate a key for the Store

methods.name: deleteStore
methods.description: Deletes a Store by given Store ID.

params.name: storeId
params.description: ID of the Store to delete

methods.name: getStore
methods.description: Gets a single Store by given Store ID.

params.name: storeId
params.description: ID of the Store to get

returns.description: struct containing information about the Store

methods.name: listStores
methods.description: Gets a list of Stores in given Context.

params.name: contextId
params.description: ID of the Context to get the Stores from

methods.name: createFile
methods.description: Creates a new file in a Store.

params.name: storeId
params.description: ID of the Store to create the file in

methods.name: updateFile
methods.description: Update an existing file in a Store.

params.name: fileId
params.description: ID of the file to update

methods.name: updateFileMeta
methods.description: Update metadata of an existing file in a Store.

params.name: fileId
params.description: ID of the file to update

methods.name: writeToFile
methods.description: Writes a file data.

methods.name: deleteFile
methods.description: Deletes a file by given ID.

params.name: fileId
params.description: ID of the file to delete

methods.name: getFile
methods.description: Gets a single file by the given file ID.

params.name: fileId
params.description: ID of the file to get

returns.description: struct containing information about the file

methods.name: listFiles
methods.description: Gets a list of files in given Store.

params.name: storeId
params.description: ID of the Store to get files from

methods.name: openFile
methods.description: Opens a file to read.

params.name: fileId
params.description: ID of the file to read

methods.name: readFromFile
methods.description: Reads file data. Single read call moves the files's cursor position by declared length or set it at the end of the file.

returns.description: array buffer with file data chunk

methods.name: seekInFile
methods.description: Moves read cursor.

methods.name: closeFile
methods.description: Closes the file handle.

methods.name: subscribeForStoreEvents
methods.description: Subscribes for the Store module main events.

methods.name: unsubscribeFromStoreEvents
methods.description: Unsubscribes from the Store module main events.

methods.name: subscribeForFileEvents
methods.description: Subscribes for events in given Store.

params.name: storeId
params.description: ID of the Store to subscribe

methods.name: unsubscribeFromFileEvents
methods.description: Unsubscribes from events in given Store.

params.name: storeId
params.description: ID of the Store to unsubscribe

content.name: InboxApi
content.description: Class representing instance of Inboxes API

methods.name: createInbox
methods.description: Creates a new Inbox.
methods.snippet: createInbox(contextId, users, managers, publicMeta, privateMeta, filesConfig, policies)

params.name: contextId
params.description: ID of the Context of the new Inbox

params.name: users
params.description: vector of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access to the created Inbox

params.name: managers
params.description: vector of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access (and management rights) to the created Inbox

params.name: filesConfig
params.description: struct to override default file configuration

methods.name: updateInbox
methods.description: Updates an existing Inbox.
methods.snippet: updateInbox(inboxId, users, managers, publicMeta, privateMeta, filesConfig, version, force, forceGenerateNewKey, policies)

params.name: inboxId
params.description: ID of the Inbox to update

params.name: users
params.description: vector of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access to the created Inbox

params.name: managers
params.description: vector of UserWithPubKey structs which indicates who will have access (and management rights) to the created Inbox

params.name: filesConfig
params.description: struct to override default files configuration

params.name: version
params.description: current version of the updated Inbox

params.name: forceGenerateNewKey
params.description: force to regenerate a key for the Inbox

methods.name: getInbox
methods.description: Gets a single Inbox by given Inbox ID.

params.name: inboxId
params.description: ID of the Inbox to get

returns.description: struct containing information about the Inbox

methods.name: listInboxes
methods.description: Gets s list of Inboxes in given Context.

params.name: contextId
params.description: ID of the Context to get Inboxes from

methods.name: getInboxPublicView
methods.description: Gets public data of given Inbox. You do not have to be logged in to call this function.

params.name: inboxId
params.description: ID of the Inbox to get

returns.description: struct containing public accessible information about the Inbox

methods.name: deleteInbox
methods.description: Deletes an Inbox by given Inbox ID.

params.name: inboxId
params.description: ID of the Inbox to delete

methods.name: prepareEntry
methods.description: Prepares a request to send data to an Inbox. You do not have to be logged in to call this function.

params.name: inboxId
params.description: ID of the Inbox to which the request applies

params.name: inboxFileHandles
params.description: optional list of file handles that will be sent with the request

params.name: userPrivKey
params.description: optional sender's private key which can be used later to encrypt data for that sender

methods.name: sendEntry
methods.description: Sends data to an Inbox. You do not have to be logged in to call this function.

params.name: inboxHandle
params.description: ID of the Inbox to which the request applies

methods.name: readEntry
methods.description: Gets an entry from an Inbox.

params.name: inboxEntryId
params.description: ID of an entry to read from the Inbox

returns.description: struct containing data of the selected entry stored in the Inbox

methods.name: listEntries
methods.description: Gets list of entries in given Inbox.

methods.name: deleteEntry
methods.description: Delete an entry from an Inbox.

params.name: inboxEntryId
params.description: ID of an entry to delete from the Inbox

methods.name: createFileHandle
methods.description: Creates a file handle to send a file to an Inbox. You do not have to be logged in to call this function.

params.name: fileSize
params.description: size of the file to send

methods.name: writeToFile
methods.description: Sends a file's data chunk to an Inbox. (note: To send the entire file - divide it into pieces of the desired size and call the function for each fragment.) You do not have to be logged in to call this function.

params.name: inboxHandle
params.description: Handle to the prepared Inbox entry

params.name: inboxFileHandle
params.description: handle to the file where the uploaded chunk belongs

methods.name: openFile
methods.description: Opens a file to read.

params.name: fileId
params.description: ID of the file to read

methods.name: readFromFile
methods.description: Reads file data. Single read call moves the files's cursor position by declared length or set it at the end of the file.

methods.name: seekInFile
methods.description: Moves file's read cursor.

methods.name: closeFile
methods.description: Closes a file by given handle.

methods.name: subscribeForInboxEvents
methods.description: Subscribes for the Inbox module main events.

methods.name: unsubscribeFromInboxEvents
methods.description: Unsubscribes from the Inbox module main events.

methods.name: subscribeForEntryEvents
methods.description: Subscribes for events in given Inbox.

params.name: inboxId
params.description: ID of the Inbox to subscribe

methods.name: unsubscribeFromEntryEvents
methods.description: Unsubscribes from events in given Inbox.

params.name: inboxId
params.description: ID of the Inbox to unsubscribe

content.name: CryptoApi
content.description: Class representing instance of Crypto API

methods.name: signData
methods.description: Creates a signature of data using given key.

methods.name: verifySignature
methods.description: Validate a signature of data using given key.

params.name: publicKey
params.description: public ECC key in BASE58DER format used to validate data

methods.name: generatePrivateKey
methods.description: Generates a new private ECC key.

params.name: randomSeed
params.description: optional string used as the base to generate the new key

returns.description: generated ECC key in WIF format

methods.name: derivePrivateKey
methods.description: (deprecated) Generates a new private ECC key from a password using pbkdf2.

params.name: password
params.description: the password used to generate the new key

params.name: salt
params.description: random string (additional input for the hashing function)

returns.description: generated ECC key in WIF format

methods.name: derivePrivateKey2
methods.description: Generates a new private ECC key from a password using pbkdf2.

params.name: password
params.description: the password used to generate the new key

params.name: salt
params.description: random string (additional input for the hashing function)

returns.description: generated ECC key in WIF format

methods.name: derivePublicKey
methods.description: Generates a new public ECC key as a pair to an existing private key.

params.name: privateKey
params.description: private ECC key in WIF format

returns.description: generated ECC key in BASE58DER format

methods.name: generateKeySymmetric
methods.description: Generates a new symmetric key.

methods.name: encryptDataSymmetric
methods.description: Encrypts buffer with a given key using AES.

methods.name: decryptDataSymmetric
methods.description: Decrypts buffer with a given key using AES.

methods.name: convertPEMKeytoWIFKey
methods.description: Converts given private key in PEM format to its WIF format.

methods.name: generateBip39
methods.description: Generates ECC key and BIP-39 mnemonic from a password using BIP-39.

params.name: strength
params.description: size of BIP-39 entropy, must be a multiple of 32

params.name: password
params.description: the password used to generate the Key

returns.description: object containing ECC Key and associated with it BIP-39 mnemonic and entropy

methods.name: fromMnemonic
methods.description: Generates ECC key using BIP-39 mnemonic.

params.name: mnemonic
params.description: the BIP-39 entropy used to generate the Key

params.name: password
params.description: the password used to generate the Key

returns.description: BIP39_t object containing ECC Key and associated with it BIP-39 mnemonic and entropy

methods.name: fromEntropy
methods.description: Generates ECC key using BIP-39 entropy.

params.name: entropy
params.description: the BIP-39 entropy used to generate the Key

params.name: password
params.description: the password used to generate the Key

returns.description: object containing ECC Key and associated with it BIP-39 mnemonic and entropy

methods.name: entropyToMnemonic
methods.description: Converts BIP-39 entropy to mnemonic.

methods.name: mnemonicToEntropy
methods.description: Converts BIP-39 mnemonic to entropy.

methods.name: mnemonicToSeed
methods.description: Generates a seed used to generate a key using BIP-39 mnemonic with PBKDF2.

params.name: password
params.description: the password used to generate the seed

methods.name: fromSeed
methods.description: Creates ExtKey from given seed.

params.name: seed
params.description: the seed used to generate Key

methods.name: fromBase58
methods.description: Decodes ExtKey from Base58 format.

methods.name: generateRandom
methods.description: Generates a new ExtKey.

methods.name: derive
methods.description: Generates child ExtKey from a current ExtKey using BIP32.

methods.name: deriveHardened
methods.description: Generates hardened child ExtKey from a current ExtKey using BIP32.

methods.name: getPrivatePartAsBase58
methods.description: Converts ExtKey to Base58 string.

methods.name: getPublicPartAsBase58
methods.description: Converts the public part of ExtKey to Base58 string.

methods.name: getPrivateKey
methods.description: Extracts ECC PrivateKey.

methods.name: getPublicKey
methods.description: Extracts ECC PublicKey.

methods.name: getPrivateEncKey
methods.description: Extracts raw ECC PrivateKey.

methods.name: getPublicKeyAsBase58Address
methods.description: Extracts ECC PublicKey Address.

methods.name: getChainCode
methods.description: Gets the chain code of Extended Key.

methods.name: verifyCompactSignatureWithHash
methods.description: Validates a signature of a message.

methods.name: isPrivate
methods.description: Checks if ExtKey is Private.

content.name: EventApi
content.description: Class representing instance of Custom Events API

methods.name: emitEvent
methods.description: Emits the custom event on the given Context and channel.

params.name: users
params.description: list of UserWithPubKey objects which defines the recipients of the event

methods.name: subscribeForCustomEvents
methods.description: Subscribe for the custom events on the given channel.

methods.name: unsubscribeFromCustomEvents
methods.description: Unsubscribe from the custom events on the given channel.

content.name: PagingQuery
content.description: Contains query parameters for methods returning lists (PagingList)

fields.name: skip
fields.description: number of elements to skip from result

fields.name: limit
fields.description: limit of elements to return for query

fields.name: sortOrder
fields.description: Order of elements in result. Use "asc" for ascending, "desc" for descending.

fields.name: lastId
fields.description: id of the element from which query results should start

fields.name: queryAsJson
fields.description: extra query parameters in serialized JSON

fields.name: readItems
fields.description: list of items read during single method call

content.name: UserWithPubKey
content.description: Contains ID of user and the corresponding public key

fields.name: isActive
fields.description: is user connected to the Bridge

content.name: Thread
content.description: Holds all available information about a Thread.

fields.name: lastModifier
fields.description: ID of the user who last modified the Thread

fields.name: users
fields.description: list of users (their IDs) with access to the Thread

fields.name: managers
fields.description: list of users (their IDs) with management rights

fields.name: messagesCount
fields.description: total number of messages in the Thread

fields.name: statusCode
fields.description: status code of retrieval and decryption of the Thread

fields.name: authorPubKey
fields.description: public key of an author of the message

fields.name: statusCode
fields.description: status code of retrieval and decryption of the message

content.name: ServerMessageInfo
content.description: Holds message's information created by server

fields.name: author
fields.description: ID of the user who created the message

content.name: Store
content.description: Holds all available information about a Store.

fields.name: creator
fields.description: ID of user who created the Store

fields.name: lastModifier
fields.description: ID of the user who last modified the Store

fields.name: users
fields.description: list of users (their IDs) with access to the Store

fields.name: managers
fields.description: list of users (their IDs) with management rights

fields.name: filesCount
fields.description: total number of files in the Store

fields.name: statusCode
fields.description: status code of retrieval and decryption of the Store

fields.name: authorPubKey
fields.description: public key of an author of the file

content.name: ServerFileInfo
content.description: Holds file's information created by server

fields.name: author
fields.description: ID of the user who created the file

content.name: Inbox
content.description: Holds all available information about an Inbox.

fields.name: creator
fields.description: ID of user who created the Inbox

fields.name: lastModifier
fields.description: ID of the user who last modified the Inbox

fields.name: users
fields.description: list of users (their IDs) with access to the Inbox

fields.name: managers
fields.description: list of users (their IDs) with management rights

fields.name: statusCode
fields.description: status code of retrieval and decryption of the Inbox

fields.name: files
fields.description: list of files attached to the entry

fields.name: authorPubKey
fields.description: public key of the author of an entry

fields.name: statusCode
fields.description: status code of retrieval and decryption of the Inbox entry

fields.name: minCount
fields.description: minimum number of files required when sending inbox entry

fields.name: maxCount
fields.description: maximum number of files allowed when sending inbox entry

fields.name: maxFileSize
fields.description: maximum file size allowed when sending inbox entry

fields.name: maxWholeUploadSize
fields.description: maximum size of all files in total allowed when sending inbox entry

fields.name: get
fields.description: determine who can get a container

fields.name: update
fields.description: determine who can update a container

fields.name: delete
fields.description: determine who can delete a container

fields.name: updatePolicy
fields.description: determine who can update the policy of a container

fields.name: updaterCanBeRemovedFromManagers
fields.description: determine whether the updater can be removed from the list of managers

fields.name: ownerCanBeRemovedFromManagers
fields.description: determine whether the owner can be removed from the list of managers

fields.name: get
fields.description: determine who can get an item

fields.name: listMy
fields.description: determine who can list items created by me

fields.name: listAll
fields.description: determine who can list all items

fields.name: create
fields.description: determine who can create an item

fields.name: update
fields.description: determine who can update an item

fields.name: delete
fields.description: determine who can delete an item

fields.name: full
fields.description: all available data about the error

fields.name: instanceId
fields.description: Bridge instance Id given by PKI
